mapper.insert: INSERT INTO proejct_student_group (id, name, limit_num, project_id, submitted, creator, create_time, last_modified_user, last_modified_time) VALUES (NULL, #{name}, #{limitNum}, #{projectId}, 0,#{creator}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedUser}, #{lastModifiedTime})
INSERT INTO project_group_student (id, group_id, student_id) VALUES (NULL, #{groupId}, #{studentId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM project_group_student WHERE group_id=#{groupId} and student_id=#{studentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_group_code (id, group_id, code, create_time, unable_time) VALUES (NULL, #{groupId}, #{code}, #{createTime}, #{unableTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE proejct_student_group SET submitted=1 WHERE id=#{groupId}
mapper.select: SELECT proejct_student_group.id, proejct_student_group.name, proejct_student_group.project_id, proejct_student_group.limit_num, proejct_student_group.creator FROM project_group_student INNER JOIN proejct_student_group ON project_group_student.group_id=proejct_student_group.id WHERE project_group_student.student_id=#{studentId} and proejct_student_group.project_id=#{projectId};
